meanings.sent1: The noninfective vaccine helped protect the children from getting sick.
meanings.sent2: The doctor confirmed that the patient's wound was noninfective and would heal on its own.
meanings.sent3: The hand sanitizer was so noninfective that even the germs refused to stay on it.
meanings.sent4: Her positive attitude acted as a noninfective shield against negativity.
meanings.sent5: The superhero's suit was made of a special noninfective material that repelled all harmful substances.

meanings.sent1: The noninfective disease did not spread to anyone else in the family.
meanings.sent2: The doctor assured the worried mother that her son's illness was noninfective.
meanings.sent3: The rumor about the alien invasion turned out to be noninfective and caused only laughter.
meanings.sent4: His calm demeanor was like a noninfective aura that calmed everyone around him.
meanings.sent5: The magical amulet had a noninfective charm that protected the wearer from negative energy.
